me.name: Xin Hong
me.bio: I am a Ph.D. candidate advised by Yanyan Lan at the Institute of Computing Technology (ICT), Chinese Academy of Sciences. Currently, I work in the areas of computer vision and machine learning with focus on visual reasoning, and joint processing of text and image data.
me.interests: I'm interested in computer vision and machine learning. Recently, I also try to apply machine learning techniques into biology problemcs, such as protein structure prediction.
me.review_experiences: CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, AAAI, IJCV, JSTSP, Neural Computing and Applications.

projects.brief: DeepCodebase is a codebase / template for deep learning researchers, so that do experiments and releasing codes become easier.
